title: Video: CRISTALLIN – Girl On A Motorcycle
content:
Given that this is only the second track from Switzerland’s CRISTALLIN, the level of hype surrounding the producer is fairly impressive.

With his new video amassing almost 1,500 views in the space of 24 hours, and a whole host of positive comments concerning the combination of Girl On A Motorcycle with it’s visuals, it’s clear that 2012 is going to be a big year for Simeon Cristallin. The video in question is a perfect accompaniment to the track; hazy and ethereal in nature with simply gorgeous colours swirling effortlessly throughout. It’s uplifting whilst remaining admirably fragile, opening itself up far more than the vast majority of electro-instrumental tracks do. Girl On A Motorcycle is available for free download from CRISTALLIN’s bandcamp.

CRISTALLIN // Girl On A Motorcycle from Simeon Cristallin on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
